name: MILITARY AIRPLANES ONLY! KC-135, A400M, C-17, C-130 at Halifax Stanfield (YHZ)
description:
Back at the start of June, quite a few interesting military aircraft paid a visit to Halifax Stanfield International Airport in Nova Scotia, Canada! This included up to 6 KC-135s from the U.S. Air Force, plus some other aircraft from the Royal Air Force and Italian Air Force too. 

The KC-135s were apparently doing a training exercise in the Gulf of St. Lawrence, but the others were likely just transiting through Halifax. Still very glad to have seen all of this action - this is the first time I've been able to film a KC-135 in flight!

I happened to be there in early June doing some plane spotting, and compiled all of the military stuff I saw into this video! Hope you enjoy this rare military action!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Thank you to RadarBox for supporting the creation of plane spotting videos on this channel! Find out more about them at https://www.radarbox.com/?referrer=AlexAviation

FLIGHT INFORMATION
00:00 - USAF KC-135R Stratotanker landing
00:40 - Italian Air Force C-130 to Keflavik (KEF)
01:57 - Royal Air Force A400M from Brize Norton (BZZ)
03:07 - Royal Canadian Air Force CP-140 touch and go
03:53 - USAF KC-135R Stratotanker landing and taxiing
05:48 - Royal Air Force C-17 to Brize Norton (BZZ)
09:05 - USAF KC-135R Stratotanker landing and taxiing
11:56 - USAF KC-135R Stratotanker takeoff
